title: From Soaring Energy Prices to Climate Threat to AI Bubble, Experts Warn Against Data Center Buildout
description: As the construction of artificial intelligence data centers expands across the nation largely unregulated, experts warn that the unrestrained buildup of these facilities is causing electricity costs to skyrocket, accelerating the climate crisis, and putting t…
